Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Foster
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Lawrence, Kedzie, Foster and Kimball due to, street blockage near Kimball/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Lawrence, Kedzie, Foster and Kimball due to, street blockage near Kimball/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.
